title: Multiplication
shortDescription: Multiplication is repeated addition. Children learn that multiplication shortcuts adding the same number many times.
importance: Multiplication is the foundation for advanced math, area calculations, and solving everyday problems like calculating total price for multiple items.
howToTeach: Start with understanding the concept: 3×4 is like 3+3+3+3 or 4+4+4
Teach the multiplication table gradually - start with 2, 5, 10
Review facts until they become automatic

examples.explanation: 4 times 7: 7+7+7+7 = 28. Or use the multiplication table.

commonMistakes: Confusion between similar multiplication facts (6×7 and 7×8)
Forgetting to carry in two-digit multiplication
Skipping a step when multiplying large numbers
parentTips: Practice the multiplication table every day - 5 minutes is enough
Turn it into a song or family quiz
Show patterns: all multiples of 5 end in 0 or 5
Don't force mechanical memorization - understanding comes first
